name: Planes (Neotoon) (Neotoon)
description:
-Side scrolling puzzle platformer
-Control an unknown character that is able to shift from physical and astral form
-Possess objects to help you solve and get through the levels
-Minimalistic design and sounds

Planes is from a solo game jam submission that was made within 1 week and now into a full game.

Travel through 18 levels (more to be added) using the power of possession to make ways for your physical body to the door. Bounce, wind up, make your own platform, Just don't get spiked!!!
